svg.text:
Use FREQUENTIST when: ├── Company has established frequentist processes ├── Regulatory requirements (FDA, etc.) ├── Need standardized, reproducible methodology ├── Team is more familiar with frequentist stats └── Want to avoid prior specification debates
Use BAYESIAN when: ├── Need intuitive probability statements (andquot;90% sure B is betterandquot;) ├── Want to peek at results during experiment ├── Have valid prior information to incorporate ├── Need expected loss for business decisions ├── Running many similar experiments (empirical Bayes) └── Want more natural interpretation of uncertainty
